price: Gye sε deԑ Nyankopͻn pε. Nokorε sε, Ɔno na Ɔnim deε εda adie ne deε asuma.
arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā mā shāa al-lahu innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra wamā yakhfā
